label.name: file contains project report or GF paperwork?
Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Final or Related Grant Project?
label.description: Is the item or event the final product of the project, or a related product?

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: Any additional unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a drop down with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Event Venue Name (display name)
label.description: The specific venue that housed the event/exhibition (as distinct from the umbrella organization.)

label.name: Did this grant result in a final product?
File contains Research and Reference Material?
Current Location at the Graham Foundation
Does this work have a condition report?
Purchase amount
label.description: if object was purchased, not donated

settings.setting: Use this field for grants to individuals only
Use this field for grants to organizations only

Use two-letter codes to specify project type: EX (exhibition), PB (book/chapter/essay/catalog), AJ (article/journal), EV (event), AV (film/video), WB (website), RE (research), OT (other), TH (thesis/dissertation), NM (new media), DB (database), OM (other media)
